parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The maximum interval between the beginning time and the end time is 86400 seconds. The interval is left-closed and right-open. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss format.

parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the ENS node.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description: The type of the instance, such as vm, eip, single_tenant, and nc. You can leave this parameter empty. The type of the instance, such as vm, eip, single_tenant, and nc.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 200.

parameters.name: ServiceType
parameters.description: The type of the service, such as vm, eip, esk, and meta.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss format.
